classData.description: Default configuration object for the DevIndex Backend Services.
classData.name: defaultConfig

classData.description: The root directory of the project.
classData.name: projectRoot

classData.description: GitHub API Configuration
classData.name: github

classData.description: Minimum stars for repository discovery.
classData.name: minStars

classData.description: Minimum total contributions to be included in the DevIndex index.
classData.name: minTotalContributions

classData.description: Number of items per page for API requests.
classData.name: perPage

classData.description: Request timeout in milliseconds.
classData.name: timeout

classData.comment:
/**
         * Maximum number of users to keep in the index.
         *
         * **Rationale:** A 50,000 user cap results in a ~20MB `users.jsonl` file. While the file is gzipped
         * and streamed over the network, allowing the index to grow unbounded (e.g., 100k users / ~40MB)
         * would introduce significant client-side memory constraints and parsing overhead, eventually degrading
         * the application's responsiveness. The cap ensures the app remains fast and "fun to use" while forcing
         * a "Meritocracy" where only the most active developers remain in the index.
         *
         * @type {number}
         */
classData.description:
Maximum number of users to keep in the index.

Rationale: A 50,000 user cap results in a ~20MB users.jsonl file. While the file is gzipped and streamed over the network, allowing the index to grow unbounded (e.g., 100k users / ~40MB) would introduce significant client-side memory constraints and parsing overhead, eventually degrading the application's responsiveness. The cap ensures the app remains fast and "fun to use" while forcing a "Meritocracy" where only the most active developers remain in the index.
classData.name: maxUsers

classData.description: Spider (Discovery) Configuration
classData.name: spider

classData.description: How many users to process in one run.
classData.name: batchSize

classData.description: Maximum depth for crawling (if applicable).
classData.name: maxDepth

classData.description: Backpressure Valve: If the tracker backlog of pending users (lastUpdate: null) exceeds this amount, the Spider will abort its run to let the Updater catch up.
classData.name: maxPendingUsers

classData.description: Updater (Enrichment) Configuration
classData.name: updater

classData.description: Number of users to process before saving a checkpoint.
classData.name: saveInterval

classData.description: Data Paths
classData.name: paths

classData.description: The main rich data store for the frontend (formerly data.json). Contains full profiles, contributions, etc.
classData.name: users

classData.description: The backend discovery index (formerly users.json). Contains login, id, lastUpdate timestamp. Used for prioritizing updates.
classData.name: tracker

classData.description: Tracks visited resources (repos, users) to prevent cycles.
classData.name: visited

classData.description: List of excluded usernames (bots, banned users).
classData.name: blocklist

classData.description: List of users to always track, ignoring thresholds.
classData.name: allowlist

classData.description: List of users who failed update processing (Penalty Box).
classData.name: failed

classData.description: Stores the minimum total contributions required to enter the index.
classData.name: threshold

classData.description: State tracking for the Opt-Out service (last processed timestamp).
classData.name: optoutSync

classData.description: State tracking for the Opt-In service (last processed timestamp).
classData.name: optinSync

classData.comment:
/**
 * @summary Configuration Manager for the DevIndex Backend Pipeline.
 *
 * This class provides a centralized, read-only configuration interface for all backend services.
 * It defines critical constants for the GitHub API (rate limits, timeouts), the discovery algorithms
 * (spider depth, batch size), and the file system paths for data persistence.
 *
 * **Architecture Note:**
 * This class uses a `Proxy` pattern to expose the `data` object properties directly on the default export,
 * providing a cleaner API for consumers (e.g., `config.github.minStars` instead of `config.data.github.minStars`).
 *
 * @class DevIndex.services.Config
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 * @singleton
 */
classData.summary:
Configuration Manager for the DevIndex Backend Pipeline.

This class provides a centralized, read-only configuration interface for all backend services.
It defines critical constants for the GitHub API (rate limits, timeouts), the discovery algorithms
(spider depth, batch size), and the file system paths for data persistence.

**Architecture Note:**
This class uses a `Proxy` pattern to expose the `data` object properties directly on the default export,
providing a cleaner API for consumers (e.g., `config.github.minStars` instead of `config.data.github.minStars`).
classData.name: Config

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='DevIndex.services.Config'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**

         * @protected
         */
classData.name: singleton

classData.description: The current configuration object.
classData.name: data
